website_summaries.verdict: A large wax warmer that does its job well without creating a mess.
pros: Circular heating element allows wax to be melted quickly and evenly
cons: Temperature controls aren't as precise as some of the others

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I went into my salon to find a room FULL of smoke and this wax pot melted. The whole thing was so hot that it could have easily caught fire anytime! I'm just glad I found it before that happened! Lesson learned... you get what you pay for! Never again will I stray from purchasing a professional product.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Anderson

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: I followed all of the instructions and when I plugged the pot in within five minutes it was so hot that the cord melted out and the outside plastic started to bubble. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: Lasted me 2.5 years!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in may 2015... 2.5 yrs later I'm buying a new one only because I have dripped so much wax on it over the years, it's time. I would say I definitely got my use out of it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is the most horrible wax warmer I have ever had. The warmer burned through the bottom and burned my furniture as well! I have contacted the seller for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nirav Mehta

customer_reviews.title: EXPLODING DISASTER
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE PRODUCT!!!! The packaging it was delivered in was all beat up and damaged and I had the device plugged in for FIVE MINUTES on the LOW setting and it caught on fire and will not turn on. I would not waste your money on such a disgrace of a product.....
customer_reviews.author: Alexis R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice personal or small job waxer. Out of one pot filled with wax I can get two brazilians and have a little left over. The temperature gauge is a little tricky. Heats up slow on low settings and really fast on high settings, then takes a long time to cool down. You have to time it just right, which I have found is, turning it on high for about 10 minutes, then low for about 30 and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mia MM

customer_reviews.title: This warmer is great because it keeps my wax at the perfect consistency ...
customer_reviews.text: This warmer replaced my old one. This warmer is great because it keeps my wax at the perfect consistency and temperature. I love that it has a range of temperature settings because it makes it easy to find the right temperature for the wax. It warms up the wax fast too. I chose the pink lid because pink is my favorite color. I love that a person can choose different colors for their lid.
customer_reviews.author: countrychic

customer_reviews.title: Great wax pots
customer_reviews.text: These wax pots have stayed loyal to me in my Spa. We bought 4 of them and they have worked GREAT. Only down fall is there's no scraper bar.... which can cause a mess if you're speed waxing a client. Otherwise, they warm up fast with zero issues. I've had them for about 5 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Melany

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Heats up very quickly and does not burn, or get too hot. Buy two hot I mean it will not burn your skin and less you have very sensitive skin, and if that is the case just keep the temperature knob on medium or just after medium.
customer_reviews.author: Megladon 🦈

customer_reviews.title: 5 minute melt time
customer_reviews.text: Melts my wax beans within 5 minutes on high. Works great! Does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: SparklesTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Tried this warmer bc it was cheaper and had ok reviews. I was scared it would burn and melt like some said, but it worked out just fine. Plugged it in, put the dial to high, and after I saw my wax melting I turned it down to medium. Warmed up quick and didn’t cause a fire. Pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: can't use it
customer_reviews.text: it keeps shorting out my outlet and will not stay on more than 10 minutes... kind of a waste
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: TRASH
customer_reviews.text: Straight up horrible. It gets way to hot and the temperature control knob does not work. Just spend the money and buy GiGi. I had a Gigi space saver for 7 years but it didn’t come with a temp control and I started using soft wax. This is trash. It was very cute and neat when it first came but the quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the blue beads  for this and I only put a small amount in at a time, so I've never filled it completely. I just use this to was small areas on the face and it works really well. I don't leave it plugged in. I plug and unplug it each time I use it and generally turn the dial about 3/4 of the way for the proper melting temperature without burning myself. I've never cleaned it yet, so I don't know about that, but I'm happy with this purchase. I use the small, wooden sticks similar to these  with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I just had a chance to use this product today and I’ve very happy with my purchase. I did some research and wanted to try waxing at home by myself. I got really good hard wax, but didn’t want to spend much on the equipment in case I wasn’t happy with results. This wax warmer definitely did it’s job plus more. Always use a test strip before waxing to make sure the temperature is not too hot. It heated the wax up quickly and kept it at a constant temperature. A lot of people can also place a can directly in the warmer, which is convenient. I’m overall very enthusiastic about my purchase and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: It’s super easy to use, of course wax is kind of messy, you just need to practice. Is you have never waxed before, try going to a salon first a couple of times, that way your body will get used to it. Don’t try to do your own bikini area if you never have waxed it, it’s going to hurt a lot. For me it wasn’t that bad, but I’ve been waxing for over 3 years. Love the color, it’s super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Simply perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Great price. Wax fits perfectly. I like the dial to adjust the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this!!! The price, the delivery, the efficiency of this product is amazing!!!! I have had several wax warmers and this by far is the best!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Flowers

customer_reviews.title: First warmer I have used
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have used a warmer for wax. It takes a bit of experience to get the right setting to have it be melted and not too hot. Once you dial in the setting that is right for you, it works every time. The wax I have been using does not need strips to peel off, you just rip the wax off after it dries. It works great for that type of wax and I have been using this for quite a while now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I had seen these!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I'm SO glad I came upon these and decided to invest in these wax warmers! These really are the best! I usually go with Satin Smooth but went with these (bought 2) and it's the best decision I made! Heats up evenly and has an auto on/off timer if it gets too hot. The outside is easier to clean than other warmers I've had and I love that the metal bucket containing the wax can come out! Also the lids are see thru with makes them look nicer than other solid tops. Plus this is truely the best price anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Tolson

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: It won't melt anything unless it's on the hottest setting, even my low temperature wax that can easily melt in the microwave in under 30 seconds, needs to be on the hottest setting. It's fine if you just need an easy to use wax melter, but don't expect to ever be able to use any setting but the hottest, or you're going to be waiting 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Based on the other reviews i was skeptical, but I’ve also never waxed before, and i didn’t want to spend an arm or leg on a machine I wasn’t sure I’d actually use more than once. This wax warmer arrived maybe a week after ordering it, does look “inexpensive” but no issues whatsoever. I bought ceripil blue wax beads to use with it, plugged it in, filled it about half way with wax, let them melt and after about 15 min I was ready to go. Waxed my underarms, lip, and did a Brazilian (with help of my bf) .... was on for a few hours and no issue!! Definitely recommend if they restock.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Guimares

customer_reviews.title: This product did work great. Then 5 months later the indicator light went ...
customer_reviews.text: This product did work great. Then 5 months later the indicator light went out and it stopped warming. Soo annoying since I use this daily in my salon!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying a wax warmer so I have nothing to compare it to, but I do really like like this warmer. It took about 20-30 minutes on high to completely melt the wax, and after it was melted I turn it down to medium heat and let it sit about 20 minutes to get the perfect consistency. Honestly the price was the biggest seller for me, but I have been using for about 4 months now and have had no issues with it and would recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little machine for at home personal use!
customer_reviews.text: You know you get a little nervous when something's really inexpensive and you think there's a chance it might be crap? Well it worked out perfectly! This little wax machine is great. I've had it for about 2 weeks now and have used it about 5 different times. It works just like it's supposed to.I made the mistake of not getting collars for it, but while it was warm/hot, I did wipe down the sides and it was fine. I love it! So glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: SimplyE

customer_reviews.title: So much safer than using the stove!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my first Wax warmer and I am 74 yrs. old and I even had my own Beauty Salon but just melted my wax on my stove. I had wax on all my pot holders, etc. but I am so sorry I never bought this sooner. It is easy to use and you don't get wax everywhere. A great item if you use depilatory wax.
customer_reviews.author: JoDolly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for me, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this paraffin wax warmer to help my hands get & stay soft. It is perfect for me! It's small enough to store away when I'm not using it but big enough to not be awkward to get the warm paraffin wax out. It's easy to use as well. I'm thinking about getting one for a friend of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: It delivers
customer_reviews.text: It is almost perfect. Cleaning it was not as easy as I expected, but using it was. In these days where we are forced due to social distancing to be DIY it is great to have affordable wonderful products like these.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Catalina Egan

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that you can pick up the wax ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had several different types of heating wax kits and I'm really impressed with how this particular one is set up to work. I like the fact that you can pick up the wax bucket for easy removal and cleaning. It accepts the 14oz cans of wax and you are able to use any types with this one. I'm glad I saved myself some money and went with this one instead of spending more money to purchase an entire kit of items I never use just to get a warmer that I may or may not like.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Harp

customer_reviews.title: No temp control
customer_reviews.text: Spend more and get a more expensive unit this thing has no temp control/regularity its all a guess oh and mine was missing the basket :/
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Better than i thought
customer_reviews.text: I thought getting this on Amazon it wouldn't blow me away but it did! It shipped quick and arrived just in time, it melts the wax SUPER fast! And I love the difference of temperatures you can choose for it so it isn't burning you. And I like there's a knob for more variety on the temperature. And once turned off and unplugged, it cools down fast. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Avg.Student

customer_reviews.title: Great little wax pot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little wax pot for a beginner like me. I use it once every two weeks and it’s perfect for what I needed it for. It stores away nicely! Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cook

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: It won't stay on, the wax isn't all melted and it keeps turning off.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: EASY
customer_reviews.text: I am so very happy with my purchase. I didn't think I could do this. I am tired of spending all the money to go to the salon to remove facial hair. Well what I spent on your warmer, the wax and the strips was less than one visit to the salon. My results were PERFECT. I will no longer have to visit the salon. The warmer did not make the wax too hot I followed the instructions and it turned out to be perfect. I would recommend this item to anyone. I am doing my legs next. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Bev Lohr

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use. Can be messy.
customer_reviews.text: Great little waxing pot for beginners, like me. Good for smaller projects, not a super deep pot. If you’re looking to use it for larger areas, like your legs, it can be difficult to get lots of wax on the stick. When you purchase a replacement canister make sure you get one with the little metal handle across it so you can wipe the excess wax on it without it dripping all over the outside of your pot.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua H.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money will only work about 2 months at best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I purchased in March and it is first of June when I’m rating review. It will not heat up!! This is junk. Do not waste your money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome gadget! It doesn't look tough, but it works better than any pot I ever used. Its very size versatile too, it has been a great addition to my business
customer_reviews.author: Dina Sarkisova

customer_reviews.title: Simply doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. The warmer doesn't melt the wax. I'm not sure if it's because it doesn't get hot enough or because it shuts off every few minutes. I left it on for an hour on high, barely melted, switched to another setting, waited another hour only to be disappointed. I didn't get to try it prior to the return window closing which I thoroughly regret.
customer_reviews.author: DOLL33

customer_reviews.title: One full year and still running strong.
customer_reviews.text: I only use this once every two weeks, but it's been one full year and it still heats up and "Maintains" heat with no problems at all. Easy to use dial with no temperature jumps between numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Bread

customer_reviews.title: NO complaints here!  Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I used this in conjunction with "cirepil blue wax" - this is my first was warmer, so I didn't have anything to compare it to. It worked well, stored the wax well, and came quickly. I've used it a few times and still no issues, so that's enough for me to be happy! The container does get pretty hot, so you want to make sure it's on a solid surface like tile or such. My first mistake was placing this on carpet to warm - it actually got SO hot, I was worried and transferred it to the kitchen. I'm really pleased with the affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Barr

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard wax!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an easy to use wax warmer and has made my beauty routine so much easier. Using this plus hard wax is infinitely better and easier than using wax strips - I'll never go back!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This wax pot is not functional. Firstly, it has three holes on top of the lid. As a licensed esthetician sanitation is very important to me and from a sanitation standpoint this just doesn’t cut it. Dust & dirt can get in through the holes and contaminate the wax. Also, the auto-shut off mechanism is unpredictable and doesn’t make it easy to use. You have to wait for it to turn back on regardless if the wax is completely melted or not. I definitely would not recommend buying this for professional use
customer_reviews.author: Mocha Carmel

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to make my own "parafin" treatment like the nail salons do but use more natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make my own "parafin" treatment like the nail salons do but use more natural ingredients. I used coconut oil, bees wax, olive oil and an essential oil. Pot heats up really fast but is smaller than I'd like. I have long hands/fingers for a woman but overall, I am happy with my purchase and I'm thrilled to know what is going in my at home "spa" treatment and know that I'm the ONLY person using it!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA MCLAUGHLIN

customer_reviews.title: Low heat
customer_reviews.text: It works but takes forever to heat up hard wax. A tin can of hard wax too a good 20min to melt on high. Not sure about other wax, I only used it for hard wax
customer_reviews.author: Sally N

customer_reviews.title: Good for home use
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I am an esthetician and I bought this warmer to use at home. There is a small removable "bucket" inside the warmer that is really cheap feeling. You put the pot of wax inside it. The bucket doesn't fit snuggly in the warmer but it's ok. I have to crank the heat dial more than what I've had to do on more expensive warmers. Any kind of wax pots will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Cardul

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely terrible! It’s turn off and on and how is that supposed to help melt the wax in proper time. Terrible! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Evie E

customer_reviews.title: Great for home
customer_reviews.text: Its a great for home waxing. There is a dial for temp control, the basin is removable for cleaning, it's very self explanatory
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beginner’s Dream
customer_reviews.text: Super affordable and extremely easy to use! When paired with my wax of choice, I simply followed the directions for heating- and couldn’t be happier with my decision to purchase this wax pot. The clean up also wasn’t messy.. Overall, I’m a very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a month now and so far it works great! I think I have pretty low sensitivity to hot wax on my skin - I'd often turn the knob to a high setting to melt the wax beads and it's not too bad. The heat turns off, I guess you could say, once it reaches the desired temperature. It'll turn the heat up once again on it's own to regulate the temperature. Takes the beads a little more than 5 minutes to reach a waxy consistency if I recall correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great product! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this product I was a beginner. And let me tell you it was really easy to use, no issues with it, warmed up easily & sort of quickly depending on the heat you put it to. Light weight, cord isn’t too long & pot held enough wax. Great product I’d say!
customer_reviews.author: Olga Fragoso

customer_reviews.title: BEST WAX HEATER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item it heats the wax evenly and to the perfect temperature. I have had the Gigi wax warmer and that one was way too hot and the wax container didn't always fit. This Item is very precise and heats your wax to the perfect temperature every time. I also love how the part that holds the wax container is also removable so you can remove it and wash it without ruining the electrical parts.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I just started waxing myself and this was perfect and easy to use for me. The controls are hard to maneuver, easy to clean and store as well. I usually keep my melted wax in there and when I use it, just turn up the heat. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Park

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what the pros use
customer_reviews.text: Definitely will heat your wax up fast & keep it hot. I have nothing bad to say about this the clean up part was my fault I spilled the wax over.
customer_reviews.author: Zahra Amiri

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast
customer_reviews.text: Works great used with sally Hansen wax. Came in handy during Covid when everything was shut down
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Value value value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the value. Ease of clean is 5 just because it has a removable pot but Honestly the ease of clean just comes down to what wax you use!
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend this product for first time users, its a genuine one and available at good price compared to similar machines in market.
customer_reviews.author: Tarun Saluja

customer_reviews.title: Wax at home, saves TONS
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Saves me tons of money every month! Trick is to not fill too much...I use it with the cirepil blue wax and my wax costs are $20 a month instead of $100+ at the salon. Win!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M

customer_reviews.title: Have to turn heat to high, but works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. I have been using with a hard wax and it worka great. I do have to turn it all the way up to get the hard wax to the right consistency, but that is not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: LindsvanleerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Omg I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: Best machine I've ever had. Temperature Guage has 3 different main modes not to mention the Temps in between low medium and high. I recommend getting the blue strapless wax from cirpril. I do my own Brazilians eyebrows and legs I save a lot of $$$$ no more European wax center
customer_reviews.author: angelica dematas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Late review. I’ve had this for a year or so now and it’s worked great! Not one problem with it and I kept the box it came in to store it when I’m not using it. I like that it came with it’s own heating bucket. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worth it! It’s hard to get the temperature control at first but then you get the hang of it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This wax warmer is amazing! Mine did not come broken at all and was nicely packed in a box. When warming up wax, it is good to leave it on low setting. This prevents your wax from burning. Just keep an eye out and mix the wax once in a while. The dial is very easy to use and gets hot quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: What I can say, the price is good. The product is on point, I got what I was paid for. Not bad at all. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Keisy Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: The wax warms up quickly and "medium" is the perfect setting.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to send this hot wax warmer back simply because I had intended to order a larger one for a different purpose, but I decided to use this instead. I do not regret keeping it. The wax warms up quickly and "medium" is the perfect setting.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Occasionally it takes a while for the wax to heat enough to use. Most of the time it’s quick though. Overall does what it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Westenhiser

customer_reviews.title: Convenient home warmer
customer_reviews.text: This kit heat up my hard wax well. I think there is a thermostat which allows it to switch off when the temperature( hi/med or low) until the wax is totally melted. This helps To keep the wax at a steady period during long usage periods.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahz

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This was a good product for the price point. It heated my wax beads quickly and did the job.
customer_reviews.author: LJ Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: I honestly think it is a good wax warmer. I didn’t experience any melting of the product but will be keeping eye on it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable..  might get a lemon
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these warmers on November 5th 2018. One is working normally and the other is not. The warmer that isn’t working, started acting up quickly and will barely turn on at this point. I just bought another as a backup for when it dies, so I’m hoping I don’t get another faulty warmer. I would say these work fine if you get a good one, but are unreliable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well! I moved overseas to Europe and I need to start doing at home body waxing and this wax pot works amazingly!! Heats up well and have used many times with my 220v to 110v transformer.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quickly
customer_reviews.text: This was great because it heated up my wax beads quicker than expected. Controlling the temperature was easy. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sarahxsays

customer_reviews.title: Small and perfect warmer for beads
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit. It's small and fits on the counter easily without taking up too much space. The indicator lights make the process effortless. Clean up a breeze. Plug in and start waxing!
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Wax it off!
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty great.. temperature is either cool or hot. Just need to text the wax and keto an eye on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't spend your money
customer_reviews.text: This wax warmer is a pain in my ass. It won't heat my wax properly. I know it will auto turn off if it gets too hot but it will turn off every 30 seconds starting from the time I turn it on. Don't waste your money on it. It takes too long to get going.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Much more convenient than a mini crockpot!
customer_reviews.text: Went with the cheapest one considering I was using a mini crockpot before! Turned it to high to melt the wax and it only took about 10 mins, turned it down to medium but it wasnt cooling off much(still reading 180 on my meat thermometer) so I took it out of the warmer for about 5 mins and it was back to 140. Set it on medium and it kept it right at 150 for the duration of the job. Worked perfectly, well worth the 16 bucks!!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Super easy!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted try and save money on my waxing, so I brought this for at home. It is light weight and super easy to use. I feel so fancy using it lol. Great investment for self care. Definitely would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ina

customer_reviews.title: Fits standard wax cans with ease
customer_reviews.text: This is all you need for a wax pot! Super easy to set up. Convenient for a countertop. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kacilee

customer_reviews.title: Does what its designed to do
customer_reviews.text: Wife is a professional cosmetologist and she loves this. Warms up her wax as her other pot
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Invest for sure you won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: This wax heater and container is awesome and heats fast and a perfect temp every time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin James Brothers

customer_reviews.title: Great wax warmer
customer_reviews.text: Great wax warmer. Put on high for about an hour then move to medium high setting for a great wax. Not too hot and let wax get to a medium comsistency. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it. It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. If I could I wouldn't even give it one star. I am PISSED
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Wood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I am.so glad I bought this as now I do not need to visit the salon and it's like having a private salon at home
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for and I am so glad I bought it! Received it on time, it was easy to get started and use. It is the perfect size! Melts the wax evenly, and it’s easy to adjust temperature so it is just right for waxing. Very happy with this purchase! I use it at least once or twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy heating device for wax. It was simple to use. Heated very quickly and the instructions kept me from hurting myself with the temperature. Great buy! Read the instructions to understand about the heating elements.
customer_reviews.author: FlyGuy73

customer_reviews.title: Good warmer
customer_reviews.text: This warmer is really good. I use it with Stripless Brazilian Hair Removal Wax Kit – Great for at Home Use – For Whole Body and Ideal for Sensitive Skin, All Natural . It is a great buy for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: prassanna

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy-to-use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this the second time! I use these for different types of waxes (hot wax and Brazilian chocolate wax). These heaters are perfect for personal use. I've had them for more than a year now and I'd buy them again if needed. They are safe, easy-to-use and heat up quickly. I like having the option of setting the heat. Purchase by all means!
customer_reviews.author: Ajab Rajvir Jandiala

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t even bother using, invest in a better wax warmer! You can’t tell the temperature because it’s constantly overheating, and turns off unless you turn it all the way onto the last setting. I’d return this but unfortunately missed the return date since I was traveling...
customer_reviews.author: Drayray🦋

customer_reviews.title: Love For My Wax Machine
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! It's small enough to fit in my hand but it absolutely does the job. It has a blue lid to help keep wax dust free & a removable pail that sits inside for the wax. I put my hard wax beans in & turned it on high & within about 5 or so minutes my wax was ready to be used! Love, love, love it & would recommend you to buy it....
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: ... take a little while to arrive but it wasn't terrible. The box was kind of beaten up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on July 18th and it got to me August 5th so it did take a little while to arrive but it wasn't terrible. The box was kind of beaten up, it wasn't secured too well and I was worried about the product not working. It worked fine, heats up pretty quick and the removable container makes it easier to clean out any wax. It's very simple to use and pretty self explanatory. I wouldn't say it's the best wax heater I've seen but it's definitely worth what you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I had this for almost 2 years I think and its still in perfect condition and works as if its new. But I got wax allll over it lol and need a new one. Gonna order again, no issues what so ever! Super satisfied :)
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This warmer is great. It works well and does a great job warming up my wax and it is not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For this price, why not?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I put a layer of tinfoil around the edges. Usually I just leave it on the highest setting. The light does turn off but it's only to keep the temperature stabilized and it always goes back on... for $18 it's been well worth the price! Even my friend bought one after seeing mine!
customer_reviews.author: Pat and Kai

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the wax at a nice constant temperature
customer_reviews.text: Even though this has more pieces than your standard salon wax warmer for facial waxing, it's actually easier to clean. Keeps the wax at a nice constant temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive little warmer!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this little warmer. I was pretty apprehensive about purchasing a brand I wasn’t too familiar with but I was not disappointed. Warms wax quickly and safely, temperature adjustments can be quickly noticed so you can get that ideal wax consistency and temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Thank you very much for the product. I received at the defined time without problems.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much for the product. I received at the defined time without problems. Everything is as seen on the site. Best regards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it, it does everything I need it too
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it does everything I need it too. It heats up fast and is easy to adjust when the wax gets too hot. The only complaint I have is that it is difficult to get the wax container out of the holder once it has all been used up. I had to use a knife and dented the metal pan that holds the wax.
customer_reviews.author: Ravey

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. New user
customer_reviews.text: Works well. First time user. Directions are vague but useable.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for more than 4 years now and it works pretty fine. Heats up quickly and temperature control works really well.
customer_reviews.author: shikha

customer_reviews.title: Salón sundry wax warmer works great has different settings that can be used depending on ...
customer_reviews.text: Salón sundry wax warmer works great has different settings that can be used depending on wax also nice that it comes with the cover and separate container if you buy wax that doest come in a container, and could not beat the cost even with my license the cheapest I could find for comparable units was $50. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Anni

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.  Excellent.  Works great, and fast too.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Works great, and uber fast heating. It's also lightweigh and aesthetically nice looking. Highly recommend to those considering purchasing. I'm also a price shopper. Pricing was great in comparison to others and considering its high quality.
customer_reviews.author: SKB
